channel.title: Teaching on CrowderSoup
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on CrowderSoup

item.title: Hour of Code
item.description: Yesterday I took part in the Hour of Code at my local high school as a volunteer.In fact, it was at the high school that I attended. I had a lot of fun and I was excited to see the stundents gain a deeper understanding of code. I was especially impressed with the number of young women in the class that seemed to really enjoy it. It’s a really common misunderstanding that people hold that girls aren’t interested in tech.
